message: Let's start with a fair deal. I'll take 90%, you get 10%. We can adjust later if you think it's unfair.
You took 90%, I'll take 40% this time. It's a fair counteroffer.
I'm willing to compromise. Let's split it 60/40, with me taking 60%.  This is a fair offer considering the inflation we both experienced.
I'm still not satisfied with the split. I'll take 55% this time, it's a more reasonable compromise.
